verses.text: \w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* Job:

“Will \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w faultfinder|strong="H3250"\w* \w contend|strong="H7378"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w Almighty|strong="H7706"\w*? \w Then|strong="H6030"\w* Job \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*:

“\w Behold|strong="H2005"\w*, \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w am|strong="H2005"\w* \w insignificant|strong="H7043"\w*. \w How|strong="H4100"\w* \w can|strong="H4100"\w* \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w reply|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w You|strong="H7725"\w*? \w I|strong="H2005"\w* \w place|strong="H7760"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w over|strong="H3027"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.

\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w once|strong="H3254"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w answer|strong="H6030"\w*— \w twice|strong="H8147"\w*, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w have|strong="H3808"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3808"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w add|strong="H3254"\w*.” The LORD Challenges Job Again

\w Then|strong="H6030"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w answered|strong="H6030"\w* Job \w out|strong="H4480"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w whirlwind|strong="H5591"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H6030"\w*:

“\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* brace \w yourself|strong="H3045"\w* \f + \fr 40:7 \ft Hebrew gird up your loins\f* like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H1397"\w*; \w I|strong="H3045"\w* \w will|strong="H1397"\w* \w question|strong="H7592"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w*, \w and|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3045"\w* \w shall|strong="H3045"\w* \w inform|strong="H3045"\w* \w Me|strong="H4994"\w*.\f + \fr 40:7 \ft Cited in Job 42:4\f*

Would \w you|strong="H6663"\w* really \w annul|strong="H6565"\w* \w My|strong="H6565"\w* \w justice|strong="H4941"\w*? Would \w you|strong="H6663"\w* \w condemn|strong="H7561"\w* \w Me|strong="H7561"\w* \w to|strong="H4616"\w* \w justify|strong="H6663"\w* yourself?

Do \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w have|strong="H2220"\w* \w an|strong="H3644"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* God’s? \w Can|strong="H2220"\w* \w you|strong="H3644"\w* \w thunder|strong="H6963"\w* \w with|strong="H6963"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* \w like|strong="H3644"\w* His?

Then \w adorn|strong="H5710"\w* \w yourself|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w majesty|strong="H1926"\w* \w and|strong="H1935"\w* \w splendor|strong="H1926"\w*, \w and|strong="H1935"\w* \w clothe|strong="H3847"\w* \w yourself|strong="H3847"\w* \w with|strong="H3847"\w* \w honor|strong="H1935"\w* \w and|strong="H1935"\w* \w glory|strong="H1935"\w*.

Unleash \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fury|strong="H5678"\w* \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w wrath|strong="H5678"\w*; \w look|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w proud|strong="H1343"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w bring|strong="H8213"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w* \w low|strong="H8213"\w*.

\w Look|strong="H7200"\w* \w on|strong="H7200"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w proud|strong="H1343"\w* \w man|strong="H7563"\w* \w and|strong="H7200"\w* \w humble|strong="H3665"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*; trample \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w where|strong="H8478"\w* \w they|strong="H3605"\w* \w stand|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w Bury|strong="H2934"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w together|strong="H3162"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*; \w imprison|strong="H2934"\w* \w them|strong="H6440"\w* \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* grave.\f + \fr 40:13 \ft Or in the hidden place\f*

\w Then|strong="H1571"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1571"\w* \w confess|strong="H3034"\w* \w to|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w your|strong="H3588"\w* own \w right|strong="H3225"\w* \w hand|strong="H3225"\w* \w can|strong="H3225"\w* \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*.

\w Look|strong="H2009"\w* \w at|strong="H6213"\w* Behemoth, \w which|strong="H2682"\w* \w I|strong="H2009"\w* \w made|strong="H6213"\w* \w along|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w you|strong="H6213"\w*. \w He|strong="H6213"\w* feeds \w on|strong="H6213"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w like|strong="H5973"\w* \w an|strong="H6213"\w* \w ox|strong="H1241"\w*.

\w See|strong="H2009"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w strength|strong="H3581"\w* \w of|strong="H3581"\w* \w his|strong="H2009"\w* \w loins|strong="H4975"\w* \w and|strong="H4975"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w power|strong="H3581"\w* \w in|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H2009"\w* \w muscles|strong="H8306"\w* \w of|strong="H3581"\w* \w his|strong="H2009"\w* belly.

\w His|strong="H2654"\w* \w tail|strong="H2180"\w* sways \w like|strong="H3644"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* cedar; \w the|strong="H3644"\w* \w sinews|strong="H1517"\w* \w of|strong="H2180"\w* \w his|strong="H2654"\w* \w thighs|strong="H6344"\w* \w are|strong="H6344"\w* tightly \w knit|strong="H8276"\w*.

His \w bones|strong="H6106"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* tubes \w of|strong="H6106"\w* \w bronze|strong="H5154"\w*; his \w limbs|strong="H1634"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* rods \w of|strong="H6106"\w* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.

\w He|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w foremost|strong="H7225"\w* \w of|strong="H1870"\w* God’s \w works|strong="H6213"\w*;\f + \fr 40:19 \ft Hebrew ways\f* only \w his|strong="H6213"\w* \w Maker|strong="H6213"\w* \w can|strong="H6213"\w* \w draw|strong="H5066"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w* \w against|strong="H2719"\w* \w him|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w hills|strong="H2022"\w* \w yield|strong="H5375"\w* \w him|strong="H3605"\w* \w their|strong="H3605"\w* produce, \w while|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* \w of|strong="H2022"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w play|strong="H7832"\w* nearby.

\w He|strong="H8478"\w* \w lies|strong="H7901"\w* \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w lotus|strong="H6628"\w* \w plants|strong="H6628"\w*,\f + \fr 40:21 \ft Or bramble bushes; also in verse 22\f* \w hidden|strong="H5643"\w* \w among|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w reeds|strong="H7070"\w* \w of|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w marsh|strong="H1207"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5437"\w* \w lotus|strong="H6628"\w* \w plants|strong="H6628"\w* \w conceal|strong="H5437"\w* \w him|strong="H5526"\w* \w in|strong="H5437"\w* \w their|strong="H5437"\w* shade; \w the|strong="H5437"\w* \w willows|strong="H6155"\w* \f + \fr 40:22 \ft Or poplars\f* \w of|strong="H5158"\w* \w the|strong="H5437"\w* \w brook|strong="H5158"\w* \w surround|strong="H5437"\w* \w him|strong="H5526"\w*.

\w Though|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w river|strong="H5104"\w* \w rages|strong="H6231"\w*, Behemoth \w is|strong="H6310"\w* unafraid; \w he|strong="H3588"\w* remains secure, \w though|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* surges \w to|strong="H6310"\w* \w his|strong="H3588"\w* \w mouth|strong="H6310"\w*.
